news.title: Simon Harris is new Finance Minister as Helen McEntee and Hildegarde Naughton also move in Cabinet reshuffle
news.summary: Follow the latest in our live Irish Independent blog here:

news.title: Woman (59) killed and husband (62) seriously injured after armed man chased them from family home
news.summary: A woman died and her husband was left critically injured after a knife-wielding man confronted them outside their home and then chased them towards a neighbouring property.

news.title: ‘An intruder, stalking the school, its teachers and its pupils’ – judge orders Enoch Burke be sent to prison again
news.summary: A judge has ruled that schoolteacher Enoch Burke should be sent to prison for a fourth time for contempt of court orders requiring him to stay away from Wilson’s Hospital School in Co Westmeath.

news.title: Ireland’s U-17 World Cup dream over as clinical Switzerland progress to quarter-finals
news.summary: For the Ireland U-17s, a Budapest-like comeback wasn’t to be as their World Cup dream came to an end in Qatar.

news.title: Woman told her sister three weeks before she was killed she would have to let murder accused son ‘go’
news.summary: A woman told her sister three weeks before she was killed that she would have to let her son “go”, but the deceased “didn't want to hear it”, a jury has heard.

news.title: Met Éireann issues yellow snow and ice warning for five counties
news.summary: Met Éireann has issued a Status Yellow snow and ice warning for five counties tonight.

news.title: Paschal Donohoe’s pay will shoot up to around €600,000 at the World Bank, but he’s been linked to much bigger jobs in the past
news.summary: Paschal Donohoe will get a major pay hike when he takes up his new job in Washington DC, earning three times his current ministerial salary, although the role is relatively low-key compared with jobs he’s been linked to in the past.

news.title: Wicked – For Good review: Ding-Dong, the atmosphere is dead in bloated Oz sequel
news.summary: Ding-Dong. The atmosphere is dead, apparently. Almost a year to the day since its award-winning predecessor arrived in cinemas, the second half of Jon M Chu’s gargantuan  Wicked  saga begins with a noisy spot of construction work. Yippee.

news.title: The truth behind the viral photo of Kris Jenner at her 70th birthday and the lengths she goes to look decades younger
news.summary: The Kardashian matriarch, Kris Jenner, rang in her 70th birthday on November 8 with a lavish bash that brought together Oprah, Adele, Bill Gates and even Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.

news.title: Who is Emer Higgins, the relative Fine Gael newbie making progress in government ranks?
news.summary: Emer Higgins, a relative newbie at Leinster House, is now making serious progress in climbing the political monkey puzzle tree.
